name: axios
text:
States like Arizona, Florida and Texas had months to learn from the mistakes of New York and other early hotspots, yet find themselves now in similar situations.

name: axios
text:
NEW: Democratic Sen. Chris Murphy said tonight he reviewed intel alleging Russian operatives placed bounties on U.S. troops, telling President Trump "it's not a hoax" and warning American lives are at risk if the report is ignored
https://t.co/zQOIGmYcz3

name: axios
text:
Carbon dioxide emissions from China have "surged back from the coronavirus lockdown" last month, exceeding their level from May 2019, a new analysis shows.

name: axios
text:

name: axios
text:
Microsoft suspended its advertising on Facebook and Instagram in the U.S. in May and recently expanded that to a global pause, according to an internal chat transcript seen by Axios.

name: axios
text:
JUST IN: John Ratcliffe has said an intel report alleging Russian operatives placed bounties on U.S. troops is still under investigation, but "the unauthorized disclosures now jeopardize our ability to find out the full story"

name: axios
text:

name: axios
text:

name: axios
text: New Zealand will host the 2021 APEC summit online as the pandemic would make it "impractical" to have "such a large volume of high-level visitors" in the country, Foreign Affairs Minister Winston Peters has announced https://t.co/rrsZx7d19X

name: axios
text:

text:
